title: 【轉知】Bridging Industry and Universities for Sustainable Future (BINUS) Indo-Pacific Forum" in Bali, Indonesia from 28-29 August 2024
department: 國際事務處國際合作組
author: 陳良愛
content:
分類： 演講暨研討會
來源： 國際事務處國際合作組 - 陳良愛 - ice@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話5107
對象： 全校教職員_全校學生
標題： 【轉知】Bridging Industry and Universities for Sustainable Future (BINUS) Indo-Pacific Forum" in Bali, Indonesia from 28-29 August 2024
日期： Mon, 18 Mar 2024 09:38:02 +0800
附檔： BINUS Indo Pacific Forum 2024.pdf (3 MB)   
The forum highlights these following events: 

-International Seminar and Academics Community Network | 28 August 2024
Discussion on the roles of the higher education institutions in the improvement of Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) in the ASEAN and Indo-Pacific regions.

-BINUS Youth Ambassador for ASEAN-Indo Pacific | 29 August 2024
Scientific writing competition for young leaders where the selected works will be invited to the grand event in Bali.

-Research Exhibition and Industry Forum | 28-29 August 2024
A showcase of products and innovations of BINUS researchers and faculty members which presents the opportunity for potential research collaboration and commercialization.

For more detailed information, please find attached the guidebook which includes the agenda and the forum programs.
